channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 据彭博社报道，蚂蚁金服以高于 Citadel 证券的价格收购瑞士信贷中国业务
item.description: Fintech giant Ant Group Co has outbid Billionaire Ken Griffin's Citadel Securities for Credit Suisse's investment bank venture in China, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.翻译:据彭博社周日报道，金融科技巨头蚂蚁集团已以超过亿万富翁 Ken Griffin 的 Citadel 证券的出价收购瑞士信贷在中国的投资银行业务。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲足球周
item.description: Talking points from the week in Asian football:翻译:本周亚洲足球的谈话要点：
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 美元在繁忙的数据周到来之前坚挺，美国通胀成为焦点
item.description: The dollar was on the front foot on Monday ahead of a packed week filled with key economic releases that will provide further clues on the global interest rate outlook, with a U.S. inflation reading taking centre stage.翻译:美元周一处于领先地位，接下来的一周充满了重要的经济数据，这些数据将为全球利率前景提供进一步的线索，其中美国通胀数据占据中心位置。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 亚洲股市在通胀盛宴前暂停
item.description: Asian shares were taking a breather near seven-month highs on Monday as investors awaited inflation data from the United States, Japan and Europe that will help refine expectations for future rate moves.翻译:亚洲股市周一在七个月高点附近稍作喘息，投资者等待美国、日本和欧洲的通胀数据，这些数据将有助于改善对未来利率走势的预期。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 亚行研究称欧盟碳边境税对减排作用不大
item.description: A European Union plan to impose tariffs on high-carbon imports could hurt developing countries in Asia but is unlikely to lead to big reductions in greenhouse gas emissions, the Asian Development Bank (ADB) said in a report published on Monday.翻译:亚洲开发银行（亚行）在周一发布的一份报告中表示，欧盟计划对高碳进口产品征收关税可能会损害亚洲发展中国家，但不太可能导致温室气体排放大幅减少。
item.author: David Stanway

item.title: 商务部长表示中国寻求加强与新西兰在CPTPP方面的合作
item.description: China is willing to work with New Zealand to continue strengthening cooperation in the process of joining The Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, its commerce minister said.翻译:中国商务部长表示，中方愿同新方在加入《全面且进步的跨太平洋伙伴关系协定》进程中继续加强合作。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾盟友图瓦卢任命费莱蒂·张为新总理
item.description: Tuvalu on Monday announced former attorney general and fisheries official Feleti Teo as its new prime minister, after he was elected unopposed by lawmakers in the Pacific Islands nation, officials said.翻译:官员们表示，图瓦卢周一宣布前总检察长兼渔业官员费莱蒂·特奥 (Feleti Teo) 为新总理，此前该太平洋岛屿国家在没有议员反对的情况下当选。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 早盘买入：日经指数关注 40,000
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 中国称已在金门附近海域进行巡逻
item.description: China's Fujian coast guard conducted patrols in waters near Kinmen on Feb. 25, China Coast Guard said.翻译:中国海警局称，2月25日，中国福建海警在金门附近海域进行巡逻。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 面对中国电动汽车竞争对手，欧洲汽车制造商在成本上挤压供应商
item.description: Europe's automakers and their already-stretched suppliers face a tough year as they race to cut costs for electric models to counter leaner Chinese rivals which are bringing cheaper vehicles to challenge them on their home turf.翻译:欧洲汽车制造商及其本已捉襟见肘的供应商面临着艰难的一年，因为他们竞相削减电动车型的成本，以对抗规模较小的中国竞争对手，而中国竞争对手正在推出更便宜的汽车来挑战他们的主场。
item.author: Nick Carey

item.title: 澳大利亚在受降雨影响的T20系列赛中横扫新西兰
item.description: Australia completed a clean sweep of their three-match Twenty20 series against New Zealand on Sunday as Matthew Wade's side won a rain-affected clash by 27 runs via the Duckworth-Lewis method at Eden Park.翻译:周日，澳大利亚队在与新西兰队的三场 Twenty20 系列赛中横扫对手，马修·韦德的球队在伊甸公园球场以 27 分的优势通过达克沃斯-刘易斯法赢得了一场受降雨影响的比赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 瑞士怀疑俄罗斯是否会参加乌克兰和平峰会
item.description: Russia is unlikely to take part at the outset of a high-level Ukraine peace conference which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, Swiss President Viola Amherd was quoted as saying by a newspaper on Saturday.翻译:一家报纸周六援引瑞士总统维奥拉·阿赫德的话说，俄罗斯不太可能参加中立的瑞士计划在未来几个月主办的乌克兰高级别和平会议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 扬科维奇合同终止后，中国队转向伊万科维奇
item.description: Branko Ivankovic has been named China's new head coach, replacing Aleksandar Jankovic after the Serbian failed to take the country beyond the group phase of last month's Asian Cup.翻译:布兰科·伊万科维奇被任命为中国队新任主教练，接替亚历山大·扬科维奇，此前塞尔维亚人未能带领中国队在上个月的亚洲杯小组赛中出线。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 亚洲杯冠军教练洛佩兹与卡塔尔队续约至2026年
item.description: Qatar's Asian Cup-winning coach Marquez Lopez has been handed a contract until 2026 and will take charge of the team in a full-time capacity, the Qatar Football Association has announced.翻译:卡塔尔足协宣布，卡塔尔亚洲杯冠军主帅马克斯·洛佩斯与卡塔尔队的合同至2026年到期，并将全职执掌球队。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: SPAC合并后，电动汽车制造商莲花科技在纳斯达克首次亮相
item.description: Shares of Lotus Technology closed up 2% in their Nasdaq debut on Friday, recouping earlier losses, after the luxury electric car maker completed its merger with a blank-check acquisition company backed by private equity firm L Catterton.翻译:路特斯科技 (Lotus Technology) 的股价周五在纳斯达克首次亮相时上涨 2%，收复早前的跌幅，此前这家豪华电动汽车制造商完成了与私募股权公司 L Catterton 支持的空白支票收购公司的合并。
item.author: Echo Wang, Lance Tupper

item.title: 美国寻求修改创始人赵的债券，法官批准币安 43 亿美元认罪
item.description: A U.S. judge on Friday accepted Binance's guilty plea and more than $4.3 billion penalty for violating federal anti-money laundering and sanctions laws through lapses in internal controls at the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange.翻译:周五，一名美国法官接受了币安的认罪和超过 43 亿美元的罚款，原因是这家全球最大的加密货币交易所因内部控制失误而违反了联邦反洗钱和制裁法。
item.author: Jonathan Stempel

item.title: 美国制造商表示，美国应阻止从墨西哥进口廉价中国汽车
item.description: The U.S. government should block the import of low-cost Chinese autos and parts from Mexico, a U.S. manufacturing advocacy group said on Friday, warning they could threaten the viability of American car companies.翻译:美国制造业倡导组织周五表示，美国政府应阻止从墨西哥进口低成本的中国汽车和零部件，并警告称这可能会威胁到美国汽车公司的生存能力。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 财政部长阿德耶莫表示，中国的困境不会减缓美国经济，但产能过剩令人担忧
item.description: U.S. Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo said on Friday that he is concerned about China's excess manufacturing capacity spilling over to the global economy, even if China's current economic woes are unlikely to slow U.S. growth in the near term.翻译:美国副财长沃利·阿德耶莫周五表示，他担心中国过剩的制造业产能蔓延至全球经济，即使中国当前的经济困境不太可能在短期内减缓美国的增长。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 尽管有政策支持，中国新建住宅价格仍延续跌势
item.description: China's new home prices slowed their month-on-month declines in January with the biggest cities seeing some stabilisation, but the nationwide downward trend persisted despite Beijing's efforts to revive demand.翻译:1月份中国新建住宅价格环比跌幅放缓，大城市出现一定程度的企稳，但尽管北京方面努力重振需求，但全国范围内的下降趋势仍在持续。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo

item.title: 美国国务院表示，美国和中国官员讨论俄罗斯与朝鲜的军事合作
item.description: A top U.S. official on North Korea held a video call this week with China's envoy on Korean Peninsula affairs in which they discussed the growing military cooperation between Moscow and Pyongyang, the State Department said on Friday.翻译:美国国务院周五表示，一名负责朝鲜问题的美国高级官员本周与中国朝鲜半岛事务特使进行了视频通话，讨论了莫斯科和平壤之间日益加强的军事合作。
item.author: David Brunnstrom, Katharine Jackson
